analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x1666df0a67a7da70674813b8a2ab113f8afbd6fa.sol:
	Contract SodaToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x1666df0a67a7da70674813b8a2ab113f8afbd6fa.sol#194-195)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x1666df0a67a7da70674813b8a2ab113f8afbd6fa.sol#67-69) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_supply' of SodaToken.totalSupplyIncrease (/unique_contracts/0x1666df0a67a7da70674813b8a2ab113f8afbd6fa.sol) is not in mixedCase
